here are the mp3s from the recording session numbers like dinosaurs demo 1: 1. urlLink saving the jinjos 2. urlLink hunter vs. gatherer 3. urlLink jazz band kids know how to party (kinda) 4. urlLink beware, the scientists may have found out a way to get rid of you 5. urlLink this is my victory dance
we finished the final recording just a little bit ago mp3s on the way...very soon style

so yeah we started recording today instruments are done. smiley. its sounding pretty good. vocals are on lockdown tomorrow. then mp3s shall be uploaded for the masses. we got the website www.numberslikedinosaurs.tk for now, its just linked to this. until the wonderful matthew izen builds our website right now, we are collecting email addresses to try and plug our band to get shows. anyone that wants to show with us. let us know. holla. anyways, yeah mp3s soon friends.

anticipation for phase 4 yeah we made all the last adjustments today its sounding pretty good. tomorrow should be fantastic. oh i cant wait. the week of reckoning. *smiley* maybe well even post some pictures from it

so yeah im getting pretty 1337 here and fucking up this template changed the background and got rid of shitty text i put one of our logos over thurr (probly stickerize that with some show $$$) yeah, day 2 complete. day 3 is tomorrow. it will be reckoning. monday will be phase 4, bahaha
so, weve created a blog, now you can check check it out. this is where we will update and all that jazz. check back soon. day 2 of 3 for phase 3. reckoning will be soon.

well, we have been at work working on 6 new songs and perfecting our set adding more instruments to the attack changing up parts and of course trying to book shows we have 6 show possibilites right now we should definately pull through with at least a few of them oh and we have www.numberslikedinosaurs.com which will be designed by maffew izen so yeah hopefully some show dates will be listed in a week or so. holla.

a few pictures for your viewing pleasure of us recording our ghetto demo there are more, but im lazy, you kow how it is dillon might be getting a job which means, dillon will have $$$ dillon can buy things..... hmmmm

so yeah, wrote complete keyboard parts for 2 songs now tracking it for "jazz band kids" tomorrow should be most ill working on getting shows right now im also sitting on some golden material probably another set and a halfs worth august will be most reckoning
ok this isnt about our band but napoleon dynamite is awesome go see that movie if youre reading this because it is so rad and awesome and funny just go

i swear, youll all leave me my stripes are commonly found now but my clan is spreading never regrouping but theyre mine i taught you how to rape and pillage remember when we sailed together remember the eyes.... mine is the roman empire reincarnate you dont make much of a khan my friend these brick walls will be the beginnings of my brick roads
did i protect you for too long? did you even know that i did? did you drink all the ice tea?

pressed against the wall you might be able to hear the excitement sure to ensure whispers were intended for whispering whispers werent intended for wailing the words suffocating my concentration this shoplift has become a stick-up floating atop of my reasoning the magician in me tells me to dissapear ill catch you in thin air if you promise not to give away the trick.

shocking shots shared shrills shunning shyness gunning gynocologists time to cleanse the earth launching a fever smallpox is the new obesity not iceage replaced with just iceage iceage is the new now wooden blocks carefully chosen refugees its jenga baby. it could've been clue or something worse tiredness is my new secret disease there are no pills that can stop me now there are no cells that can survive now

im like a bruised salamander or comic book character (villain) i got three finger sized robots for fingers the other one remains telescreens tell us 'scream' arcade joystick button smasher cubic knowledge of uslessness plug in to me baby, plug in give in, give in to my packaging

watching werewolves water waspnets this is the tomorrow we spoke of binoculars been a clueless eyeless noclops the second dimension is coming soon the shadows have been warning us for years with their lunaphobic dissapearances someday i will be a fourth dimensional shadow doing the same. the war has just begun.

white flags wont mean anything to me i wont be able to see colors my eyes have rotted away but i smell the pity all your lies lied in the dirt that was above me i dug out of that shit baby, shovelless im gonna leave you limbless im gonna limbo regardless, guardless my car is on fire and im gonna keep driving as long as this gasoline takes me noise outside of your frontdoor

world = mine nocturnal by nature aqueous by choice we invented communication whose the powerful one now the skylight said "i am really just blue glass, for now" the atlantic said "i am really just blue grass, sit down" youre selling no soliciting signs door to door lock the doors make no keys make, knock, ease away my feet are numb my hands are letters the chair has no legs (amputee) the ladder has no steps the chair is a snake the latter is too. the ladder is two.

wetter than water anxious for dry times wishing washing was shunned cruise ship sinks succombed to the two thirds fractions are ray guns elliminating illumination i still have the/to touch television gives you a reason to buy some new eyes ran ran away like the bird who saw no bread urbanization, en guarde.

i really regret the loss of your hearing why? commands like knives like war im beginning to like war i believe my hand is well played ill leave my chair empty icy i see then you can join me sneak attack ambuscade if only you would have understood me recognition and appreciation my desires. zzz
youre so afraid to think...

yeah yeah i want a second pair of eyes collection time. unexpected one expressed it anticipationisticism packing unpacking like animals together we would rather be apart and we like that feeling dont stop building in the fireplace its just pointless enough to work. the smoke is killing me.

watered down everything this rain has dulled a new potency chinese checkers like tarot cards tell me how the west begins im the runny fucking nose here to reafuckinsure you that youve never met anyone.

creation is my strength destruction is your weakness days of the week, stacked 7 card stud, i dont know how to play that game openshut like the medicine cabinet whats done is done spontaneous compassion closer than ever and ever gets jealous and moves in once again this ones for ever.
leave out two more oh im leaving tomorrow dizzy drunken dancing on this, the day of our rebirth rejoice. remember. ready?

up and down like hands trying to handle the euphoria euphemisms for what, they dont know theyd own no boundaries gleaming glassy see through painting kind of avoids the point but who can blame him gun to his head like the frigid fucking fingers he sees. daily. dissapear like a game of clue twas the revolver weve solved it.

backwards kisses are infecting me dez iz diz ez easily contracted enough drowsy lousy eyes undotted cuz im that damn tired drive away as soon as possible you are drifting as well as well as a lost boat with no captain el capitan quiere dormir

very very very trixy i see the I-C-K-Y ickyness of two preglued sides they dont fit, they just stick i should be growing immune by now or maybe i already am disease taught me well something crazy or something well see, im sure well fly to iceland you make me feel alone in a good way though
my expectations are quite accurate although not very pleasing to say the least flood me, i wanna name a new river or become a raft does god know hes not the only one?
roller coaster ride i wish there was one i was there once, once many attributes for you to misinterpret every time you meet me. names are just names.
you changed your handwriting

good morning, good mourning? no, good morning pink plastic like this vital liquid it holds me inside fuel me, use me, i wont notice. vessel to vessel must sell to rest well clicky clicky click clatter restlessness has taken over, and it shows ^(and its hoez) ok look, peanut butter? yes. jelly? no. it just doesnt work. just because you're grape-flavored doesnt mean you're jelly. you arent even jam. not like yallz aint pimpz in your own right (like restlessness) just eww, you make a bad sandwich.

wishy wash washed up wattered down unreasonable needs with reasonably recently receeding means mean nothing short of taller than towers could ever stand towers could never stand to be treated like the way you trick or treated me with the trick track trek truck pack of rubber bands packing, rub her hands time to kill the forgivingness in me time to kill... time to kill... oh yeah, i almost got bummed by a knife whispy whisper
hello everyone (noone). this is me. this is everything. this is rockin. this is rock history, oh girl.

such efforts and endeavors speaking words and thoughts that translation just cant seem to defy sailing for the say-anything save safety nets jumping for the juxtaposed justifications my somewhat secretly incorrect numbers are the ones that seem to break me swim out, far, just swim skipping dinner for skinny dipping this jacket is so much less powerful than time and options forever unexplored taboo is the new to-do what you mistook for hopping when i was at the park when i became the crooked cop and you looked away like the inner dilemma of an honest citizen that you are and you said "never forget my name" so i didnt

time is racing distance through the sex-shunned sections of this life well never call home. were lost, but well never call home. it seems like every billboard contains the word "comatose" i think i am beginning to understand it. its hard to take it sitting down but i just cant stand this language of vagueness. its not ironic that an oxymoron isnt irony semantics and some antics are more than a thesaurus could ever tell you if he decided to speak we waked in nighttime naked in winter

decieving was never this pleasing when it meant that we wore cliche clothing cleverly i trust this is a new way of falling asleep chosen words and implications like a computers worst enemy a splendid spare tired dreamer dont do this to me im throwing urlLink myself down these stairs cuz i cant be upstairs anymore situation encompases options

spotless, scrubbed clean scrubbed through layer of paint insignificant inside/out upside/down last i heard, hope was hiding in there teaming up with knowledge playing games with understanding and intergrity cops and robbers sighing and wasting time standing around thinking whispers to ourselves geography is standing up to seatless bus stations

misleading and everything... intentions yet to be decoded a language of foreign symbols and concepts like counting that we just cant count on we just dont understand it we just just cant stand it opposites attract the same indecipherable prize long since divided civil wars and ownership imperialism and poverty spoken word and the like how we were has long since been forgotten.

sentence pending due to indecisive punctuation distributing me from the back of a van cardboard box, packaged into their hands we kiss you a new kind of arthritis we will all be motherless one day pollution through pollination polygamy is my new polio hide and secrets "hey, if you had blue eyes would you still be able to stare, lets become amphibians, again"

ive what ive this is isnt getting any ending why wonders himself. (into existance) 8 times, youve killed me curiosity has put the knife in me again and said "theres no good mourning" afternoon comes one three before four but who could face an armed backhanded front for a cough in a fist followed by a kiss and a handshake and im still the one who backs down from upward fronting magazines.

navigation like when we were young swinging our newfound flight sawdust saw us when we didnt care to know longing until... christmas... its time for giving and its time for getting spent time forgiving spent time forgetting developing you with my crayon box one eigth empty the depthless call unto me again three's a crowd, or so they tell me absence of light, lets unplug the phones.

ask me for an address so you can lose yourself there if my name wasn't surrounded by x's would you still call me out? everybody is their isnt since noone else cares waking up early has never been so overrated. lets give in to the quiet and let the quiet guide our eyes stare at me like im starin at you and hope that we wont notice when tomorrow sneaks into today ....its summer somewhere.... ....its summer here....

call me pro-progress call me anti-anticipation say what you will we all know who i am or we think we do chairs are the loneliest kind of furniture the chairbound man will never understand walking is like crawling without a destination i wear my opposable thumbs proudly domination, evolution, bling bling there truly is no escaping facts noone asked me if i wanted to stop breathing liquid cut the umbilical cord, as my body snaps away i still have liquid lining my lungs

it seems pretty obvious to me maybe im dependent or insecure but thats who i am wake up, barely roll out only to wet my feet in a pool of ignorance consider me momentarily then try to forget about what ive done i just want some time to think i just want sometime to be soon i feel sick...
allow me to cross my heart and hope to cross paths all i want is warmth platonicy, infect them all lips touch, well never touch again well never breathe again

now im preying on the prayers praying for revenge playing with intentions and pledging well be friends promised sandcastles, we stayed in town instead she said 'weve found a new way of killing' do you wanna be our first victim? ill save you, my friends, from being the next its time to see how good i am at finding new friends its time to find caring if i can all the loving people in the city are preoccupied new agreements are really really not going over well

tension, release desire, unexistant like the sex we never had and like the sex we never will promises are lies, except definite accept definitions of misrepresentations kicking and screaming, im sure i have the red cape, just escaped im telling some fortunes, ive set up some mayhem. building bridges and destroying them its all i have left and its killing me its all i have left and its fine by me

trusting my trust will betray me its the only truth i have left all i can hold or touch or feel reinventing characters imagination is a lost cause the north is calling me im the migrating kind i guess im going to my hiding place

finding comfort in enclosure finding closure in/is nothing i feel like a ventroquilist without puppets i am a paralyzed mime please please me my needs are outweighing my possibilities what you must know defies language its something words will never begin to understand monoliths and rosebuds. formulate me. translate me. anyone. please. help.

occupied with troublesome attention grabbing obsessive users "used" you said you used to say "same thing everyday" survival is based on intentions of living take my responsibilty for once im not atlas, im too young and weak split me up like the Fantasia broomsticks thin me out divide me up add up my means subtract my integrity multiply by pretentiousness now we are equal

distance has disguised itself as disinterest alone has never felt so alone take steps for touch compassion dipped in shyness longing for a definition of defiance discrete in this crescent disc you left rings on my table you left wrong, right? my red giant sized emptiness suns yet to give birth to life cry themselves to their supernova potential our existance is to make existance

skinny skim milk kid pale like the bucket you stole from me when i was young this is called treason with no treasure mapped out like the world when you all said it was round remember when we used to revolve remember when we used the revolver it just feels wet and looks red its not about you self centered said someone it tickled me a new kind of smile my time, might i misuse or waste on you probably not there is no vacancy

sufficiency? no. this is me aiming a new sense of aimless senselessness oh yeah, its on. tattooed on the wrist of my compassion shot into the bullet shaped hole in my shirt im knocking and turning pivot on my peglegged pride lick the soul from my words carress the sincerity straight out of my everything

what you say about responsibility just a blip in my nonsense detecting machines radar less sad and more settling when did you all get shot? dissapointment like the turquoise turtle turbulance upon realizing he can never leave home and still he knows one day he must return to where he crawled when he was young when the ocean beckoned and swimming was all that mattered. independence like the kind you and i will never miss again.

mesmerized by distractions i didnt notice the change realized second glances always murder the first my anxiety, a call for home, what about morality? your 4 eyes by my 2 stared down your forgotten ice, melted water running downstairs i know you were a touch touch touchin and i noticed you were a touch touch touchin when i point say goodnight i can see whose intentions were whose/worse i can taste the holes/dots/weak in your eyes/lies

i broke the guillatine i spelt it wrong i took the togetherness from bow and arrow plastic hammer, a real nuisance absurdity, anonymity biography, noone fucking cares start a club, hang up your signs we reserve the right insert stereotype leave oh and anyones identity has been determined what was it about a bottle and how it infected us with amnesia and honesty

insoles of sandals have finally gotten the praise they deserve the colors forming on my body a consequence of my location and my thriving for living and my life source, itself, punishes hold my hand like a giggily japanese school girl about to jump in front of a train a math book full of troubles stays closed forever theres somewhere thats happier to dwell she was there leaning on a wall by herself and i was enveloped in remaining stationary because girls like that dont go out alone

i see the village left, once again, in seclusion and i hear the optimism in them scream "i am free" they dont need anyone you are your spelling spell it like you mean it its not far from the other side colors still retain their names and names still mean something and we just cant stand to sit here anymore our justified stance cant hear any more reasons for staying

renaming is kind of like forgetting or ignoring and we dont care anymore because what lies in my back pocket of these black jeans is more important than integrity red background that conceals my two thirds snip snip cut sounds when i am pulled away and wiped clean (for the first time) when oxygen introduces itself and proves its importance and another two thirds will later prove that formulas cant be trusted.

bound to be bound to each others dependence which room is mine i have been forgetting lately adult programming has conquered me like it has once before morse code taps on thin unpainted walls awakes me but also warns me forbidden knowledge screams out bonus a restraining order for longing compassion disorderly straining for encompassing longing zipcodes kill time zones when noone is looking empires all crumble when noone is lucky
sometimes you say there are some times when i am but you dont breathe me anymore. did you ever before?

your strive for importance and your lack thereof evolve, but lacking letters played backwards ruins nearly everything its a set up in itself youll come to realize convert your converse to convey more convenientionality

im not much more than my satisfaction but im not one for fullfillment when will they let me breath again forsaken elements and im craving what ive abandoned spinal fluid and 2 liter sodas self defense and stripes something more than my eyes will ever let me believe and what i wouldnt give for some sense of reasonless lust bury my apathy hijack it baby my cockpit feels empty along with my aspirations

pack of cigarettes reminds me of crayons and drawing when i was young and that i used to sit so low through and through scissors just cant be down with paper sad girls with cutouts and this is my anenome invisibility, cloak me with your kindness

nominations have declared me as their weekly wardrobe and interpretations have never seemed to let me down so much my fingertips are feeling cold tonight but you wouldnt know that feeling formulas, youve studied them so and pressed repeat youre attempts at meaning, dont mean much to me choose a color to match the number assigned at the end of your name oscillating is the verb you selected but shock factor doesnt affect me anymore self inflicted, somewhat overrated curiosity for how deep you are you tell me, and for once i believe you

hidden in my blind spot then opens its eyes so bright and wings so wide its name, once spoken, now unheard you let me hear it a bit when i was young i told you "i cant say anything" but you just didnt listen and downtown speaks when it misses your voice but it sees that youve lost half of your mobility when you went away, and you knew it would ruin me too. but with it, all my lines have been dotted when they used to be solid and dark. my carpet now shows me traces of the new past and it reminds me that time means a lot so now i dont abide by genetics and forces of nature all i have left is well mentioned, and thinning as well.

all this time, genocide hours minutes and seconds bleeding we feel it for them developement, cardboard boxes the lost piece of the jigsaw puzzle the one that makes us it knows a thing or two about possibilities and roads less traveled and options forgotten and knowledge is needed but all of these highways and numbers of such power memory, save my communication / reputation save our separation markers, for the most part, unused but each and every color says more than youll ever know im longing to show you how long it took to show.
variables have become replaced with some new kind of ghosts

she made me a cape so i learned how to fly she made me a coffin so i learned how to die enveloped in the devil's undeveloped undertones never ever heard cuz we dont pick up the phone we tend to round down cuz its the only way we know how to fall and you, youre always overacting when you think youre sufficient, but you really are still lacking any kind of knowledge about the days that have passed you need to buy a time machine and you need to buy it fast oh it was quite a sight when we turned off all the lights a party aint a party unless it cant last all night lots of words were spoken, a loud room full of syntax she fucked me and i fucked back and the slingshots slowly showed us everything
